response.overview: Somewhere around Africa 2000, the southern part of Zambia, the camera shows the sun, trees rocks different parts of nature. the camera moves to a very vast land full of grass and cows, goats, and pigs the camera slowly fades in introducing a village called chisaaka village full of activities the sun shining people moving up and down the rivers around young woman bathing young children some ladies pounding maize, chibwantu been made and sold chicken in the pounds farmers busy in their big farm getting ready for the rain season.
response.title: Family Slavery
